Package com.example.seqr.controllers

Class AnnouncementController

java.lang.Object
com.example.seqr.controllers.AnnouncementController
public class AnnouncementController extends Object
Controller class to handle interactions between the data base and announcment objects

      finds an event and gets all the announcements associated with it
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID associated with a certain event in the database
      onCompleteListener - a method to handle what to do with the retrieved announcements
